project_plan.name: Temperature Converter CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Create a command-line tool in Python that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. The user will specify the input temperature and the desired output unit.

task.name: Build command-line interface for user input
Implement error handling for invalid inputs (non-numeric values, unsupported units)
Write tests for the temperature conversion functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
